attributes.action: Stop airlines from banning unrestricted travel regardless of COVID vaccination.
attributes.additional_details:
Everyone has the right to choose what is injected into their body. Coercing businesses that prevent people from unrestrictive travel is a complete violation of one’s Humanitarian Rights, and airlines must not be allowed to exploit this.

Furthermore, it potentially violates any religious or cultural beliefs, which may not permit such substances from being injected into the body.
attributes.background:
Airlines are insinuating and advertising that in order to travel with them, COVID vaccinations will be mandatory and should be proved.

It has already been agreed in parliament that mandatory COVID vaccinations will NOT be instigated, and airlines must not be allowed to prevent travel for this.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323442
